samir.name: Samir Mesbah
samir.bio: Captain Samir Mesbah combines military leadership with advanced technical expertise gained from his 10-year service as a Digital Transformation and Information Management Officer. With a background in Computer Science and Graphics Design, he specializes in Business Analysis and Frontend Development. His expertise in Full Stack Development and Systems Architecture enables him to transform complex requirements into user-centric solutions that align with strategic objectives.

michael.name: Michael Laplaine-Pereira
michael.bio: Captain Michael Laplaine-Pereira combines hands-on military leadership with deep technical expertise in software development. During his 10-year tenure as an Operations Officer and Infantry Platoon Commander in the Canadian Armed Forces, he honed his skills in strategic planning and team leadership. His software engineering background, coupled with expertise in both frontend and backend development, allows him to deliver comprehensive technical solutions while maintaining the disciplined approach instilled by his military service.

jean.name: Jean-Philippe Nadeau
jean.bio: Major Jean-Philippe Nadeau serves as our Chief Business Strategist, bringing 15 years of distinguished service as a Logistics Officer in the Canadian Armed Forces to the corporate sector. His extensive military logistics experience, combined with his formal business education, gives him a unique perspective on organizational efficiency and strategic planning. As a Major, he applies the same precision and systematic approach to business strategy that he used in military logistics operations, ensuring our company's growth aligns with clear strategic objectives.
